titleStmt.title: Here begynneth a lytell treatyse of the turkes lawe called Alcaron. And also it speketh of Machamet the nygromancer
Koran.

publicationStmt.publisher: In fletestrete in the sygne of the Sonne by me Wynkyn de worde],

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon. Conjectured publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
